Filter API names mapping

Confidence Filter -> filter1
    confYmax 		-> filter1Parameter1
    confCy2Min 		-> filter1Parameter2
    ConfSureBadPix 	-> filter1Parameter3
    ConfSureGoodPix -> filter1Parameter4
    
Pixel Density Filter -> filter2
    PixDensMaxBadNeighbors -> filter2Parameter1
    
EparSmoother Filter -> filter3
    EparAlpha         	-> filter3Parameter1
    EparBeta 	        -> filter3Parameter2 (available only in Maintenance)
    EparRangeThreshold 	-> filter3Parameter3 (available only in Maintenance)
    
FlyingPixRemovalFilter - first pass => filter4
    FlyingPixDelta -> filter4Parameter1

Tap Filter -> filter5
	TapMaxDeltaDepth -> filter5Parameter1

Confidence Tap Filter -> filter6
	tapConfMinIR	-> filter6Parameter1
	tapConfMaxIR	-> filter6Parameter2
	tapConfMinIRDeltaDepthNoise	-> filter6Parameter3
	tapConfMaxIRDeltaDepthNoise	-> filter6Parameter4
    
Accumulation UFrame Filter -> filter7 (available only in Maintenance)
	AccumulationUFrameFilterMinThreshold	-> filter7Parameter1
	AccumulationUFrameFilterMinConfidence	-> filter7Parameter2
	AccumulationUFrameFilterMaxConfidence	-> filter7Parameter3
	AccumulationUFrameFilterMidThreshold	-> filter7Parameter4
 
FlyingPixRemovalFilter - second pass => filter8
    FlyingPixDelta -> filter8Parameter1

Shampoo Filter    -> filter9
    shampooIter   -> filter9Parameter1
    shampooLambda -> filter9Parameter2
    shampooSigma  -> filter9Parameter3
    shampooTau    -> filter9Parameter4

The sequence of filters in the pipeline of SK filter processing -

1) Confidence filter                   (filter1)
2) Flying pixel removal - first pass   (filter4)
3) Pixel density filter                (filter2) 
4) Epar or Shampoo (not both)          (filter3 or filter9)  - if both, use Epar
5) Tap or ConfidenceTap (not both)     (filter5 or filter6)  - if both, use ConfidenceTap
6) Flying pixel removal - second pass  (filter8)
 
Accumulation UFrame Filter (filter7) is developed by DSSDK for intermediate calculations and is not part of SK filters release.
